title: Ian Murray – 2020 Comments on Margaret Ferrier’s Statement
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ian Murray, the Shadow Secretary of State for Scotland, on 1 October 2020.
content:
This is astonishing recklessness from an SNP MP, which has put people’s health at risk.
